channel.title: Run.bat
channel.description:
okay this is what my compiler error says please help asap
[code=java]Registry key 'Software\JavaSoft\Java Runtime Environment\CurrentVersion' has value '1.7', but '1.6' is required. Error: could not find java.dll Error: could not find Java SE Runtime Environment. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
this is in the file.. what do i need?
[code=java]@echo off title Source java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]

item.title: Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

hey im not entirely sure… but i have a couple of things you could try.

first is changing the word “java” in your compiler to a path… heres an example

Second thing i would try, is delete all your class files and then try compiling again, why? if your class files were compiled with a newer version of java than you have it can cause problems. not entirely sure why but i had this problem once before.

Hope it helps you

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat

item.description:
